WET Messages¶

Generates nice-looking output for WET messages.

WET messages are Warnings, Errors and Troubleshooting (WETs) messages to guide users on how to correctly proceed when facing errors which solution is known by the Farseer-NMR community.

For more information visit: https://github.com/Farseer-NMR/FarSeer-NMR/wiki/WET-List

The class WetHandler handles, configures and generates complete WET messages. But if you want a simplified used the generate() straightforwardly.

class FarseerNMR.core.wet.WetHandler(title, msg, wetnum, *, width=70, style='*', please_visit='Please visit:')[source]¶

Handles generation of WET messages.

Parameters:
title : str

The title of the message. For example: ERROR or WARNING. If request returns formatted title.

msg : str

The WET message.

wetnum : int

The num of the WET message that relates to the WET list. See WET list at: https://github.com/Farseer-NMR/FarSeer-NMR/wiki/WET-List

width : int, optional

The width of the wrapped and formatted message. Defaults to 70.

style : str, optional

The style char for the WET message. Defaults to “*”.

please_visit : str

The “Please visit” message. Defaults to (obviously): “Please visit”.
Attributes:
msg_fmt_str

WET message format string.

msg_formatted

The formatted WET message.

spacer_line

A formatted spacer line.

title

Formatted title.

wetlink

The web page for corresponding WET number.

wetnum

The reference WET number.

Methods

gen_wet() Generates the complete WET message public formatted.
gen_wet()[source]¶

Generates the complete WET message public formatted.

Returns:
str

The full WET message.
msg_fmt_str¶

WET message format string.

msg_formatted¶

The formatted WET message.

According to msg_fmt_str.

spacer_line¶

A formatted spacer line.

Formatted title.

The web page for corresponding WET number.

wetnum¶

The reference WET number.

FarseerNMR.core.wet.generate(title, msg, wetnum, **kwargs)[source]¶

Returns a formatted and complete WET message.

Parameters:
title : str

The title of the message. For example: ERROR or WARNING.

msg : str

The WET message.

wetnum : int

The num of the WET message that relates to the WET list. See WET list at: https://github.com/Farseer-NMR/FarSeer-NMR/wiki/WET-List

kwargs : kwargs

Parameters to pass to WetHandler.
Returns:
str

The formatted and complete WET message for public display, according to WetHandler.gen_wet().
